comment._content: Did you notice that every man is wearing a hat? Whether in the country or city, at one time all men wore hats and many women also.

comment.author: 18171509@N00
comment._content: To accept aid from the "outside" must have been difficult for communities like this which often had Mormon roots, were isolated and believed in self-sufficiency. See this link cpluhna.nau.edu/Research/ecology_and_mormon_colonization.htm
